root: ^I'm on a date with %FullName:NPC:1% and I use the bathroom.
^When I use the sink, the water sprays out all over my crotch. What should I do?
^Wet my entire pants with water so there isn't a wet spot only on my crotch
^Climb out the bathroom window, run to a store for another pair of pants.

res1: ^It's a nice restaurant so %FullName:NPC:1% is embarrassed that I dressed myself this way.

^%FullName:NPC:1% is embarrassed that %Pron:1:1% is at a table with me in this nice restaurant since I have my shirt tied around my waist. I explained to %Pron:1:2% the situation and I was trying to not embarrass myself but %Pron:1:1% isn't having any of it and ends the date early.
res2: ^So many people in the restaurant laugh at me but %FullName:NPC:1% understands it was from the sink.
^I'm just happy that %FullName:NPC:1% understands and I am just trying to ignore everyone else in the restaurant who is screaming out that I look like I wet myself. But it's hard to ignore them.
res3: ^I exit the bathroom and at first no one notices until I sit down and water is leaking everywhere.

^%FullName:NPC:1% is mortified as people start filming me and I end up being all over the internet because I emerged from the bathroom with soaking wet pants. Those videos get too many views. And I try to explain to %FullName:NPC:1% but %Pron:1:1% is so embarrassed and wants to leave.
res4: ^I ran to a nearby store, purchased another pair of pants and returned with those.

^%FullName:NPC:1% immediately notices the new pants so I have to explain what happened to %Pron:1:2% and %Pron:1:1% finds this hilarious and can't stop laughing and we end up having a great rest of the night.
global decl: ^When I use the sink, the water sprays out all over my crotch. What should I do?
